bug.author: debuggy
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
Clicking export csv button will cause error <denchmark-h:h2>Reproduce Steps</denchmark-h>
go to any job detail page click export csv button, there is no response. the console will print an error
<denchmark-h:h2>Screenshots</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8444268/103738708-6f8b0980-502f-11eb-8ec7-ef34cfe6cc48.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Additional Info</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: Seems that the button doesn't work when the task status is waiting / stopping / ... <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yiyione>@yiyione</denchmark-link>
